original_text: The living things each moved forward, in the direction that the spirit wanted them to go. They did not turn as they moved.
korean_text: 영이 어떤 쪽으로 가면 그 생물들도 그대로 가되 돌이키지 아니하고 일제히 앞으로 곧게 행하며

sentences.original_text: The living things each moved forward
in the direction that the spirit wanted them to go
They did not turn as they moved
